document_data.name: ''Sickle of Shorn Bonds''
document_data.creator: [[Laeral Silverhand]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''sickle of shorn bonds''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[sickle]] crafted by [[Laeral Silverhand]] for [[Farideh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of many pieces of so-called "[[Silverhand gear]]" crafted for [[adventurer]]s who helped to protect [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description:
[[File:Sickle_Shorn_Bonds_WoW_wallpaper.jpg|thumb|''Farideh holds the ''sickle of shorn bonds'' aloft.]]
Silverhand gifted this weapon to Farideh in recognition of the latter's recognition of the importance of forming bonds with others.
document_data.Powers: The ''sickle of shorn bonds'' forced enemies to fight alone, and then punished them for it. Receiving an injury from the ''sickle'' had a chance of placing a maddening hex on the recipient that prevented their allies from healing them. It further had a chance of hexing not only the target but all of that target's nearby allies.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Farideh, a [[tiefling]] [[warlock]] to whom Silverhand also gifted the ''[[seal of forbidding]]''.
